on reading compounds: 華鬘【ケマン】Buddhist decoration engraved with various motifs, often made from gilt copper (e.g. for adorning the inner shrine of a temple)
kun reading compounds: 百日鬘【ひゃくにちかずら】long-haired wig used in kabuki (used metaphorically to refer to a thick growth)
全かつら【ぜんかつら】full wig, whole wig
